name: Pok3 - Mac Style Twitterfox Icon
description:
Tested on: Firefox 3.5.2
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Description:
  
  I just got inspired by user 20999 's Stylishier 
  series and did a icon to use with twitterfox.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Notes, setup and options:
  
  If you dont like the blue-shiney icon (as me), you can change it
  to the gray one. Just search for OPTIONS in the end of the code
  and follow the intructions. Have fun! :D
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Version History:
  
  - 23.AUGUST.2009 - Ver. 1.0 : First release.
css:
/*------------------------------------------------------------------ 
  Pok3 - Mac Style Twitterfox Statusbar Icon  (Ver. 1.0)
  Author: Fabio Fernandes a.k.a Pok3
  twitter: http://twitter.com/pok3
  deviantART: http://pok3.deviantart.com
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Tested on: Firefox 3.5.2
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Description:
  
  I just got inspired by http://userstyles.org/users/20999' Stylishier 
  series and did a icon to use with twitterfox.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Notes, setup and options:
  
  If you dont like the blue-shiney icon (as me), you can change it
  to the gray one. Just search for OPTIONS in the end of the code
  and follow the intructions. Have fun! :D
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  Version History:
  
  - 23.AUGUST.2009 - Ver. 1.0 : First release.
-------------------------------------------------------------------*/


@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);

#twitternotifier-statusbar-button, 
#twitternotifier-statusbar-button[state="active"],
#twitternotifier-statusbar-button[state="error"] {
  list-style-image: url("data:image/png;base64,")!important;;

}


/* OPTIONS:
If you don't liked the blue icon try delete the lines  
to get the gray icon for the online status too:
*/

/*DELETE THIS LINE ...
#twitternotifier-statusbar-button[state="active"] {-moz-image-region: rect(16px, 16px, 32px, 0px)!important;}
... AND THIS TOO :D */
